revision.text: Possibly: Sermons, by Hugh Blair, D.D. one of the ministers of the High Church, and professor of Rhetorick and belles lettres in the University, of Edinburgh. (Edinburgh : Printed for William Creech, Edinburgh ; And W. Strahan, and T. Cadell, London, M, DCC, LXXVII. [1777]) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/509290226
